page.title: 18Keswick's Guest Houses
page.content: Running a guest house is hard work.Six thirty a.m.is time to get up.Then you get the breakfast ready.Next you get the packed lunches ready.After breakfast its time to do the bedrooms.First you strip the beds and empty the bins and ashtrays. Then you take the dirty sheets down stairs.Then cleaning comes next .The sinks ,the toilets and the bathroom are cleaned.Then you have your dinner. I interviewed a restaurant owner.He said he only sells food that is local.I asked him when his busiest season is and what sort of people he gets. His reply was his busiest season is between July and October.He also said he gets locals and tourists of all nationalities.He said he prefers Keswick to a city.
